page.title: 07Darfield Main Colliery
page.content: The mine is 150 years old and has 3 shafts. There are 135 miners working at the pit. The manager is called Mr Pearson. He was very different to what I expected because he did not wear a suit or tie,but was smoking a pipe. About 100 years ago a terrible fire occured involving all the pit ponies,some of whom died. Nowadays there is a lot of safety equipment. It is hung up in cloakrooms and consists of a helmet to guard against falling rubble,a safety belt with emergency lights,safety boots and working overalls. The long strike of 1984/85 affected the community badly. It made life hard for everyone.The happiest day for Mr Person was when work was resumed but the pit is due for closure. Eventually the site will revert to farmland.
